results.title: Combination of metformin with liraglutide in treating HAIR-AN syndrome in children: A case report and literature review.
results.journal: Zhong Nan Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban
results.text_hl: Combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with liraglutide in treating @<m>DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@HAIR-AN syndrome@@@ in children: A case report and literature review.

results.title: Acanthosis nigricans monstre successfully treated with topical tacalcitol, metformin, and oral contraceptives.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@Acanthosis nigricans monstre@@@ successfully treated with topical @CHEMICAL_1_alpha_24_dihydroxyvitamin_D3 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C023850 @@@tacalcitol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and oral contraceptives.

citations.NLM: Rizzo A, Tognetti L, Rubegni P, Cinotti E. Acanthosis nigricans monstre successfully treated with topical tacalcitol, metformin, and oral contraceptives. Dermatol Ther. 2020 Jul;33(4):e13660. PMID: 32447791

results.title: Oral Metformin for Treating Dermatological Diseases: A Systematic Review.
results.text_hl: Application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovarian disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@) related @DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@acanthosis nigricans@@@, and @DISEASE_Hirsutism @DISEASE_MESH:D006628 @@@hirsutism@@@ yielded mixed clinical results.

citations.NLM: Sung CT, Chao T, Lee A, Foulad DP, Choi F, Juhasz M, Dobry A, Mesinkovska NA. Oral Metformin for Treating Dermatological Diseases: A Systematic Review. J Drugs Dermatol. 2020 Aug 1;19(8):713-720. PMID: 32845585

results.title: Metformina en el tratamiento de enfermedades dermatologicas: una revision narrativa
results.text_hl: ...El uso de la @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformina@@@ para la hiperinsulinemia mediante la accion sobre el receptor @GENE_SLC2A4 @GENE_6517 @@@GLUT4@@@, mejora significativamente la @<m>DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@AN@@@.

citations.NLM: Monte-Serrano J, Villagrasa-Boli P, Cruañes-Monferrer J, Arbués-Espinosa P, Martínez-Cisneros S, García-Gil MF. Metformina en el tratamiento de enfermedades dermatologicas: una revision narrativa Aten Primaria. 2022 Jun;54(6):102354. PMID: 35569426

results.title: A randomised control trial to assess the clinical efficacy and metabolic effect of metformin vs pioglitazone in patients with acanthosis nigricans.
results.text_hl: A randomised control trial to assess the clinical efficacy and metabolic effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ vs @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@acanthosis nigricans@@@.

results.title: A Molecular Perspective on the Potential Benefits of Metformin for the Treatment of Inflammatory Skin Disorders
results.text_hl: The most impressive aspect of these findings is that long-term treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ led to a complete improvement of @<m>DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@acanthosis nigricans@@@ in adolescents within the normal weight range.

citations.NLM: Chang JE, Choi MS. A Molecular Perspective on the Potential Benefits of Metformin for the Treatment of Inflammatory Skin Disorders Int J Mol Sci. 2020 Nov 25;21(23):. PMID: 33255783
citations.BibTeX: @article{33255783, title={A Molecular Perspective on the Potential Benefits of Metformin for the Treatment of Inflammatory Skin Disorders}, author={Chang JE and Choi MS}, journal={Int J Mol Sci}, volume={21}, number={23}}

results.title: Hyperandrogenism, insulin resistance and acanthosis nigricans (HAIR-AN syndrome): an extreme subphenotype of polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@Weight loss@@@, lifestyle modification and combined hormonal pill and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ are considered first-line treatment.

citations.NLM: O'Brien B, Dahiya R, Kimble R. Hyperandrogenism, insulin resistance and acanthosis nigricans (HAIR-AN syndrome): an extreme subphenotype of polycystic ovary syndrome. BMJ Case Rep. 2020 Apr 9;13(4):. PMID: 32276996

results.title: [The 495th case: young female-hyperandrogenemia-severe insulin resistance].
results.text_hl: After treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, the @<m>DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@acanthosis nigricans@@@ was significantly relieved, @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood glucose@@@ was controlled satisfactorily, and the menstrual cycle was restored.

citations.NLM: Cui YY, Jiajue JRZ, Chen MP, Lu L, Yu M, Wang LJ. [The 495th case: young female-hyperandrogenemia-severe insulin resistance]. Zhonghua Nei Ke Za Zhi. 2022 Jun 1;61(6):703-707. PMID: 35673756
citations.BibTeX: @article{35673756, title={[The 495th case: young female-hyperandrogenemia-severe insulin resistance].}, author={Cui YY and Jiajue JRZ and Chen MP and Lu L and Yu M and Wang LJ}, journal={Zhonghua Nei Ke Za Zhi}, volume={61}, number={6}, pages={703-707}}

results.title: A New Mutation of the INSR Gene in a 13-Year-Old Girl with Severe Insulin Resistance Syndrome in China
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was finally diagnosed with @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@type A insulin resistance syndrome@@@. After 2 months of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ had spontaneous @DISEASE_Muscle_Cramp @DISEASE_MESH:D009120 @@@menstrual cramps@@@ and significantly improved @<m>DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@acanthosis nigricans@@@ and sex hormones.

citations.NLM: Jin J, Liang X, Wei J, Xu L. A New Mutation of the INSR Gene in a 13-Year-Old Girl with Severe Insulin Resistance Syndrome in China Biomed Res Int. 2021;2021():8878149. PMID: 33728347
citations.BibTeX: @article{33728347, title={A New Mutation of the INSR Gene in a 13-Year-Old Girl with Severe Insulin Resistance Syndrome in China}, author={Jin J and Liang X and Wei J and Xu L}, journal={Biomed Res Int}, volume={2021}, pages={8878149}}

results.title: Differential effects of metformin on immune-mediated and androgen-mediated non-cancer skin diseases in diabetes patients: a retrospective cohort study.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To investigate immune-mediated (@DISEASE_Urticaria @DISEASE_MESH:D014581 @@@urticaria@@@, @DISEASE_Dermatitis_Allergic_Contact @DISEASE_MESH:D017449 @@@allergic contact dermatitis@@@ and @DISEASE_Psoriasis @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@) and androgen-mediated (@<m>DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@acanthosis nigricans@@@, @DISEASE_Hidradenitis_Suppurativa @DISEASE_MESH:D017497 @@@hidradenitis suppurativa@@@ and @DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@) @DISEASE_Skin_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D012871 @@@skin diseases@@@ associated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use.

citations.NLM: Tseng CH. Differential effects of metformin on immune-mediated and androgen-mediated non-cancer skin diseases in diabetes patients: a retrospective cohort study. Dermatology. 2023 Mar 15;():. PMID: 36921584
